attributes.action: include the 'Holocaust' in the UK School curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent research suggests that School teachers in the UK are avoiding teaching controversial subjects such as the 'Holocaust'. 

If we avoid teaching our children the truth about the history of our cultures, including our mistakes, then be prepared for history to repeat itself.

Sign my petition to help our teachers teach and our children to learn the truth.

During World War II the Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces, General Dwight Eisenhower said;

'Get it all on record now - get the films - get the witnesses - because somewhere down the track of history someone will get up and say that this never happened.'

Act now before future generations forget what happened.

Thank You,

Paul Knox
